wifi_config.title: BeeFi Configuration
wifi_config.description: Enter your BeeFi details to generate a buzzworthy QR code

error.required: Hive name is required for the bees to find it
Secret nectar is required for Bee Guarded/Shield hives

generated_qr.title: Generated QR Code
generated_qr.description: Scan this code to connect to the Wi-Fi network

qr_code_printer.title: Wi-Fi Access Cards
qr_code_printer.instructions: Cut along the dashed lines to create individual Wi-Fi cards

steps.title: How to Use
steps.description: Follow these steps to generate and share your Wi-Fi QR code

1.title: Configure Wi-Fi
1.description: Enter your network name, select security type, and add password if required.

2.title: Generate QR Code
2.description: The QR code is automatically generated as you type your Wi-Fi details.

3.title: Share & Connect
3.description: Download, print or share the QR code. Others can scan it to connect instantly.

print_setup.title: Print Settings
print_setup.description: Configure your print options for the Wi-Fi QR code cards.

messages.enter_details: Please enter valid Wi-Fi details to generate a QR code.
messages.ensure_requirements: Ensure the SSID is provided and, if applicable, the password is set for WPA or WEP security types.

success.title: Bee-autifully Saved!
success.description: Your BeeFi has buzzed safely into the hive.

error.title: Bee-ware! Save Failed
error.description: The bees got lost on their way to the hive. Your BeeFi configuration couldn't be saved. Please try again.

seo.title: Generate WiFi QR Codes Easily
seo.description: Generate WiFi QR codes easily with our WiFi QR Code Generator. Share your WiFi credentials securely and conveniently.
seo.keywords: WiFi QR Code, WiFi QR Code Generator, WiFi QR Code Maker, WiFi QR Code Creator, WiFi QR Code Generator Online

seo.title: Page Not Found
seo.description: The page you are looking for does not exist. Please check the URL or return to the home page.

not-found.message: You have trespassed into a not found zone. Beware of the bees!
